thought: To craft a dried_kelp_block, I need to place 9 dried_kelp in a 3x3 grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the dried_kelp (slot 23) into the first slot (1) of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1
